name: Project: Pirates
description:
Project: Pirates Made for UDC#25

In this first-person puzzle game, you are completely alone, stranded in the vast expanse of space as a lone space pirate. As you explore the galaxy, you encounter mysterious anomalies that defy logic and challenge your problem-solving skills.

Will you be able to survive on your own and uncover the secrets of the universe, or will you fall victim to the dangers that await you? The fate of the galaxy is in your hands.

-  Story  -

In the year 3023 it is possible to survive in space with modern technology, humans have not evolved much, but his greatest creation, the computer, has evolved itself and now stands above all, the Galactic Federation! Many people fear them and bow to them, but some resist.

The Federation has made things better, such as abolishing money, there are no more annoying contracts, there is also no more starve, no wars, no rich guys and poor guys, everyone is equal, but whoever opposes the Federation is neutralized.

Everyone has to work all the time, maximum productivity, when you are broken you are only allowed to sleep, there is almost no free time, food is adjusted according to physical needs, if you get cancer you are neutralized.

In a far away solar system in the Unity Galaxy there are still many raw materials and treasures. The Galactic Federation is doing everything to get these raw materials from the Mono Solar System, a small group of nine people, apart from the Federation, got wind of it.
